    1. What is the correct syntax for reference true in a formula or control property?

      The correct syntax is TRUE

      The correct syntax is True.value

      The correct syntax is true

      The correct syntax is True


    2. What is the behavior of a control that is not visible on the screen?

      Hidden controls do nothing and don’t affect the app in any way.

      Hidden controls process the same as a visible control, even though they are not shown.

      It is not possible to hide a control in Power Apps.

      Hidden controls are processed only if the app maker has set the ProcessHidden property.


    3. What happens when you change the DisplayMode of a control from Edit to Disabled?

      The control looks different but allows for the same interactions by the user.

      The control looks the same but allows for different interactions by the user.

      The control looks different and allows for different interactions by the user.

      The control’s Visible property is set to true or false.
